citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm on May 24,
2023.
The licensee was contacted by phone and stated that she was out of state and noone else was available to allow an
inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm on May 24, 
2023. 
The licensee was contacted by phone and stated that she was out of state and noone else was available to allow an 
inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
